content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelter at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of a furnace employed to convert iron ore and coal into iron plates. This structure supports the resource preparation needed for downstream crafting operations.

### Copper Smelter at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace used to process copper ore and coal into copper plates. Its role is to secure copper availability for producing subsequent components.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors:
 – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) when calling get_entities.
 – Ensure that function calls match the defined signature; supplying extra positional arguments can lead to TypeErrors.

• Lab Placement and Retrieval:
 – Confirm a Lab exists in the inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
 – Check that functions retrieving entities return a valid iterable rather than None to prevent iteration errors.

• Lab Crafting and Resource Chain:
 – Verify that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available prior to crafting a Lab.
 – Ensure that the upstream resource requirements (for example, having enough iron plates and copper plates) are met to avoid cascading crafting failures.
